item.title: How to Use Multi-Etch
item.description: Our detailed instructions are aimed at small users trying out titanium etching and anodizing for the first time. But the principles are the same for larger users with a dedicated production line, similar to those made by IPEC Global. Large production IPEC Global Small production A typical small-user setup Etch safely with Multi-Etch # Mix the Multi‑Etch: Shipped to you as a dry powder for ease of storage. Just add water!

item.title: About Multi-Etch
item.description: Optimize titanium for welding and anodizing without hydrofluoric acid! # After using hydrofluoric acid ourselves for 10 years, we understood the hazards of working with HF and nitric acids. Read more about our history. Even relatively “safe” consumer products such as rust removers, which are sometimes used for etching titanium, contain hydrofluoric acid. Read more about the environmental and safety issues of HF. Etch titanium safely with Multi‑Etch # Mix the Multi‑Etch: Shipped to you as a dry powder for ease of storage.
